name: OPPO F21s Pro 5G
description: OPPO F21s Pro 5G is a powerful device with a RAM extension feature, that offers brilliant operational speed to users.

name: Apple iPhone 13
description: The Apple iPhone 13 features a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and A15 Bionic chip for fast performance.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch display, Snapdragon 888 processor, and powerful cameras for professional-grade photos.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation and superb sound quality with the Sony WH-1000XM4 wireless headphones.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: The Dell XPS 13 laptop offers an ultra-thin, ultra-light design with powerful specs and a 13.4-inch display.

name: HP Spectre x360 2-in-1
description: HP Spectre x360 offers versatile 2-in-1 laptop functionality with a 13.3-inch touchscreen and Intel i7 processor.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 features a large Air-Sole unit for superior comfort and a sleek, stylish design.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 22 offers responsive cushioning with Boost technology for maximum comfort during long runs.

name: Sony Bravia 55-inch TV
description: Sony Bravia 55-inch 4K UHD Smart TV with Android OS for smooth streaming and vibrant picture quality.

name: Samsung 75-inch 4K UHD TV
description: Samsung 75-inch 4K UHD TV with Quantum Dot technology for an immersive viewing experience.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch with M1 Pro chip, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD for powerful performance and seamless multitasking.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45 Headphones
description: Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones feature world-class noise cancellation and crystal-clear sound quality.
